str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
Sitting, seated; steadfast, firm. From a derivative of hezomai; sedentary, i.e. immovable.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
From ana and the base of agkale; constraint; by implication, distress.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.
Of unknown origin; a maiden; by implication, an unmarried daughter.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Well, nobly, honorably, rightly. Adverb from kalos; well.
